body.head: Chapter 43: Of Abba Mark the Less, the Disciple of Abba Sylvanus
body.p: They used to say concerning Abb√¢. Sylvanus that he wished to depart to Syria, and his disciple Mark said unto him, Not only do I not wish thee to depart from this place, O father, but I will not permit thee to go [now]; wait then here for three days more; and on the third day Mark died in peace.
